title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Strive to stay objective when you land in an emotionally charged situation, especially with family members or close friends. You might not be able to rationally figure out everything happening in the moment now. Regardless, you certainly dont need to react to someones goading or criticism. Take time to examine the assumptions you and another person are making that may or may not be factual. Be honest in your self-appraisal; claim whats true and release whats false. A Sufi saying teaches, Detachment is not that you should own nothing. But that nothing should own you. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
